CustomField.description: Order in which this question is displayed in a Survey Result. This is a concatenation of the section display order and this questions display order. A typical value will be concatenation of two three character strings (005 002). One representing the display order of section and other representing the display order of the question itself.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Order in which this question is displayed in a Survey Result. This is a concatenation of the section display order and this question display order.
CustomField.label: Question Display Order
